Package scene

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
scene.Scene
public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
This class groups together the elements of a scene. That is, the light sources, the geometries, and some additional details.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    AmbientLight ambient
    The ambient lighting of the scene.
    Colour background
    The background colour of the image.
    Geometries geometries
    The collection of geometries in the scene.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Scene​(Colour background, AmbientLight ambient)
    Constructor for the scene.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • background

      public final Colour background
      The background colour of the image. This will be applied when a ray doesn't intersect any geometry.

    • ambient

      public final AmbientLight ambient
      The ambient lighting of the scene.

    • geometries

      public final Geometries geometries
      The collection of geometries in the scene.

  • Constructor Details

    • Scene

      public Scene​(Colour background, AmbientLight ambient)
      Constructor for the scene.
      Parameters:
      background - The background colour of the scene.
      ambient - The ambient lighting of the scene.
